entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023
